billEvents.eventText: referred to consumer affairs and protection

title: Creates a consumer bill of rights regarding railroad passengers
summary: Creates a consumer bill of rights regarding railroad passengers; establishes certain services shall be provided whenever railroad passengers have boarded a train and are delayed more than three hours at a train station prior to departure; creates an office of railroad consumer advocate.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law and the general business law, in relation to creating a consumer bill of rights regarding railroad passengers
